function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High energy consumption","Impact":"Increased operational costs, environmental impact","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient HVAC systems, optimize building occupancy patterns","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Impact of occupant distribution on COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19, public health risk","Mitigation":"Implement ventilation systems, control occupancy patterns","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Affect of air exchange rate on energy consumption and virus transmission","Impact":"Higher energy consumption, increased virus transmission risk","Mitigation":"Optimize air exchange rate, implement efficient HVAC systems","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air quality monitors","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"}]}
